mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_nick, member_point, member_email, member_agree, member_join, member_level, member_login) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNick}, 0, #{memberEmail}, 'Y', sysdate, '일반회원', null)
mapper.update: update member set member_pw=#{memberPw} where member_id=#{memberId}
update member set member_nick=#{memberNick} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_id from member where member_email=#{memberEmail}
